Changelog
=========

0.4 - 2011-12-07

- Added Plone 4.1 compatibility 
- Edit widget is now aware of MultiParagraphPage to preserve its order on editing


0.3 - 2010-03-21

- Fixed context of new paragraph. 
------------------

0.2 - 2010-03-21
----------------

- No <hr/> after the last paragraph [svincic]
- Fixed kupu init when adding new paragraph [lewy]

0.1 - (Unreleased)
------------------

- Initial release
